get_html_content[source]

get_html_content(url)

Gets the raw html content of a given url

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_html_content('https://cs.uic.edu')[:400]

'  \n<!doctype html>\n<!--[if lt IE 7]><html class="no-js ie ie6 lt-ie9 lt-ie8 lt-ie7" lang="en-US"> <![endif]-->\n<!--[if IE 7]><html class="no-js ie ie7 lt-ie9 lt-ie8" lang="en-US"> <![endif]-->\n<!--[if IE 8]><html class="no-js ie ie8 lt-ie9" lang="en-US"> <![endif]-->\n<!--[if gt IE 8]><!--><html class="no-js" lang="en-US"> <!--<![endif]-->\n    <head>\n\n<!-- OneTrust Cookies Consent Notice start, uic'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
